org.codehaus.groovy.grails.commons
Interface GrailsDataSource

All Superinterfaces:
GrailsClass, InjectableGrailsClass
public interface GrailsDataSource
extends InjectableGrailsClass

Represents a data source in Grails.

Since:
Aug 6, 2005
Author:
Steven Devijver

String getDbCreate()
